welcome_message_body: Welcome to Salto, Brazil! Get ready to be captivated by the city's charming architecture, vibrant culture, and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Salto has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Viracopos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost domestic flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity.

airports.airport_name: Comte. Rolim Adolfo Amaro State Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

airports.airport_name: Campo dos Amarais–Prefeito Francisco Amaral State Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
